髾髾髾

髾字的基本解释

髾
shāo
头发梢：“撮发为髻，散垂馀髾于其后。”
旌旗上所垂的羽毛：“曳长庚之飞髾。”
古代妇女衣服上的装饰，形如燕尾：“蜚襳垂髾。”

髾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāo］
［《廣韻》所交切，平肴，生。］
(1)髻后下垂的头发梢。
(2)燕尾之属。古代妇女衣饰。
(3)旌旗上所垂的羽毛。

髾字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　髾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1454第35
【廣韻】【正韻】所交切【集韻】【韻會】師交切，?音梢。髮尾。【史記·司馬相如傳】蜚纖垂髾。【又】曳彗星以爲髾。【註】髾，燕尾也。【後漢·馬融傳】曳長庚之飛髾。【註】卽旌旗所垂之羽毛也。　又【集韻】所敎切，音稍。義同。　又【集韻】山巧切，音稍。毛髮長。

髾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
髾字的起名意思

暂无。

Snoring
Basic explanation of words
Snoring
shāo
Tips of hair: "The hair is pulled into a bun, and the rest of the hair is scattered behind it."
Feathers hanging from the flag: "Fragment of Chang Gung's Feathers."
The decoration on the clothes of ancient women resembled a dovetail: "Fridays hanging down."
Snoring
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāo]
["Guangyun" cross cut, flat food, raw. ]
(1) The hair tips that droop behind the bun.
(2) The genus of swallowtail. Ancient women's clothing.
(3) The feathers hanging from the banner.
Snoring
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【髟字部】　髾; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1454 35
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Intersections [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Association] Intersections with teachers,? Sound tips. The tail. 【Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography】The slender and slender hair. [Also] Flick the comet as a slap. [Note] Fei, swallowtail also. [Later Han·Ma Rong Biography] Drag Chang Gung's Fei Fei. [Note] The feathers hanging from the banners are also.　 [Ji Yun] cut, sound slightly. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Shan Qiaoqie, with a little sound. Hair is long.
Snoring
